params.referrer: The address of the referrer. Passing address(0) will use the default SendEarn vault.
params.salt: The salt to use for the SendEarn vault's CREATE2 address.

SEND_EARN().notice: The default SendEarn vault created with the factory. This vault does not have a referrer.

VAULT().notice: The underlying vault that SendEarn vaults uses.

affiliates(address).notice: Tracks existing SendEarn contracts where the affiliate is sharing the fees.

createSendEarn(address,bytes32).notice: Creates a new SendEarn vault with a referrer.

isSendEarn(address).notice: Whether a SendEarn vault was created with the factory.

setPlatform(address).notice: Sets the address of the platform that receives Send Earn fees

setSplit(uint256).notice: Sets the split to the referrer.
